landing.noapp: Iwe haudi app kuti ushandise {{ BRAND }} pafoni kana piritsi rako! Webhusaiti inoshanda zvakanaka panharembozha.
landing.intro: {{BRAND}} ({{TRANSLITERATION}}) inzira yakanaka yekusangana neshamwari itsva. Paunoshandisa {{ BRAND }}, isu tinosarudza mumwe munhu chero nguva uye tinokurega iwe uchitaura mumwe-kune-mumwe. Kukubatsira kuti ugare wakachengeteka, chats hadzizivikanwe kunze kwekunge waudza mumwe munhu kuti ndiwe ani (hazvikurudzirwe!), uye unogona kumisa chat chero nguva. Ona <6>Mitemo nemamiriro edu ezvinhu</6>, uye <8>Mirairo yeNharaunda</8> kuti uwane ruzivo rwezvekuita nezvausingaite pakushandisa {{ BRAND }}. {{ BRAND }} vhidhiyo chat ndeye AI yakamisikidzwa asi hapana moderation inonyatso. Vashandisi ndivo vane mhosva yemaitiro avo pavanenge vachishandisa {{ BRAND }}
landing.disclaimer: <0>Unofanira kuva nemakore gumi nemasere (kana kuti uzhinji huri pamutemo munzvimbo yako) kana kupfuura kuti ushandise {{BRAND}}</0>. Ona {{BRAND}}'s <4>Terms and conditions</4> kuti uwane rumwe ruzivo. Dziviriro yevabereki inogona kubatsira vabereki kuwanikwa mune zvekutengesa uye unogona kuwana rumwe ruzivo pa <6>https://www.connectsafely.org/controls</6> pamwe chete nedzimwe nzvimbo.
landing.pleaseleave: Ndokumbira ubve paLamdazle uye ushanyire saiti yevakuru panzvimbo kana zviri izvo zvauri kutsvaga uye iwe uri 18 (kana ruzhinji rwepamutemo munzvimbo yako) kana kupfuura.
landing.termscheck: Nekutarisa bhokisi unobvuma kuti waongorora chibvumirano chekuzosungwa ne{{BRAND}}'s <3>Terms and conditions</3>, <5>Privacy policy</5> and <7>Community Guidelines</7 >.
landing.agecheck: Iwe haugone kushandisa sevhisi iyi kana uri pasi pemakore gumi nemasere kana zera reruzhinji rwepamutemo munzvimbo yako. Ona <1>Terms and conditions</1> kuti uwane rumwe ruzivo. <3>Nekutarisa bhokisi unobvuma uye unomiririra kuti une makore gumi nemasere (kana kuti uzhinji huri pamutemo munzvimbo yako) kana kupfuura.</3>

chat.error: Pakanganisika pakubatanidza sevha: Tapota edza zvakare
chat.nocam: Kukanganisa nekamera: mudziyo wakumbirwa hauna kuwanikwa

search.random: Kutsvaga munhu wausingazive waunogona kutaura naye...
search.common: Kutsvaga munhu wausingazive ane zvaanofarira zvakafanana...
search.retry: Izvi zviri kutora nguva yakareba, kutsvaga munhu wausingazive pane ...

chat.searching: Kutsvaga munhu wausingazive waunogona kutaura naye...
chat.connected: Uri kutaura nemunhu wausingazive. Iti Mhoro...
chat.language: Mese munotaura mutauro mumwe chete. Sarudza {{"Any"}} pamutauro kuti udzime.
chat.simulated: Mutorwa anogona kunge ari kushandisa yakatemerwa webcam

cookies.message: Isu tinoshandisa makuki kuvandudza ruzivo rwako pane saiti, zvisinei iwe unogona kubuda. Nekudaro <1>uchaona ads kakawanda</1> sezvo isu hatizokwanisi kuronda kuti wakatozviona here kana kuti kwete.
cookies.privacy: Unogona kudzidza zvakawanda nezve mashandisiro atinoita makuki pa <1>Privacy Policy</1> yedu

alerts.keepclean: Ichengete yakachena uye ubatsire nekutaura maitiro eNSFW
alerts.banreason: Nekuda kwehunhu hwakashata. Usanetseka, kurambidzwa hakugari nekusingaperi.
alerts.disableadblock: Shambadziro dzinotibvumidza kuita sevhisi yedu. Ndokumbira dzima ad block kuti utaure pasina zvinokanganisa zvishoma.

error.adblocker: Hatikwanise kukurega uchiita izvozvo nekuti uri kushandisa Ad blocker
error.disableadblocker: <0> Tinovimba urikunakidzwa newebhusaiti yedu. Kuti urambe uchiishandisa, tinoda kukukumbira kuti udzime nemutsa adblocker yako. Webhusaiti yedu ndeyemahara kushandisa, uye zviziviso zvinoratidzwa pawebhusaiti yedu zvinotibatsira kubhadhara mari yekufambisa sevhisi. Nekudzima adblocker yako, unenge uchitibatsira kuti webhusaiti yedu irambe ichishanda.</0><1>Maita basa nerutsigiro rwenyu!</1>
